refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Subarray selects a block of cells from an input array. The result is an array whose shape is defined by the boundary coordinates specified by the subarray arguments. A boundary coordinate pair must be specified for every dimension of the input array.

informalexample.para: This example selects the values from the last two columns and the last two rows of a 4×4 matrix.

step.para: Create an array called m4x4:CREATE ARRAY m4X4 <val:double>[i=0:3,4,0,j=0:3,4,0];
Return an array containing the cells that were in both the last two columns and the last two rows on m4x4:subarray(m4x4,2,2,3,3);This query returns:[ [(10),(11)], [(14),(15)] ]
